{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::612fe6342bfb857dbbe1bd18::headhunter_ua", "source": "headhunter_ua", "country": "UA", "company": "Deep Kowledge Group", "position": "Longevity Science Copywriter / Editor", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, удаленная работа

Deep Knowledge Group, an investment holding specialized in disruptive technologies (biotech, AI, fintech, spacetech) is looking for a Senior Copywriter and an Editor to work on a full-time basis.

Conditions:

  • 100% remote from any part of the world.
  • The topic is practical longevity.

The perfect candidate would need to:

  • have medical background/experience
  • be available to dive into new material quickly
  • manage oneself and the team
  • native English
  • having background in scientific publications is a huge advantage.

Ключевые навыки

Английский — C2 — В совершенстве
Английский язык
Time management
Teamplayer
Business communication
Business Correspondence
